  • Method Details

    • distance

      public static String distance (String mast_height, String height_in_milliradians, int zoom)
      Function that calculates distance to the target
      Parameters:
      mast_height - height of the target
      height_in_milliradians - height of the target in milliradians
      zoom - used zoom
      Returns:
      distance to the target in meters

    • Length

      public static String Length (String Distance, String length_in_degrees, int zoom)
      Function that calculates visual length of the target
      Parameters:
      Distance - distance to the target
      length_in_degrees - length of the target in degrees (in periscope)
      zoom - used zoom
      Returns:
      visual length of the target in meters

    • Speed

      public static String Speed (String length_in_meters, String time_in_seconds)
      Function that calculates speed of the target
      Parameters:
      length_in_meters - length of the target
      time_in_seconds - how much time it took target to cross its length
      Returns:
      speed in knots

    • AoB

      public static String AoB (String visual_length, String real_length, boolean away)
      Function that calculates AoB of the target
      Parameters:
      visual_length - visual length of the target (in meters)
      real_length - real length of the target (in meters)
      away - tells if target is going away or towards
      Returns:
      AoB to your boat in degrees
